item.title: physics738
item.description: Lecture on Advanced Topics in Quantum Optics (E) - physics738 Course Lecture on Advanced Topics in Quantum Optics (E) Course No. physics738 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 2+1 4 WT/ST Requirements: Preparation: Fundamentals of Quantum Mechanics, Atomic Physics Form of Testing and Examination: Requirements for the examination (written or oral): successful work within the exercises Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: The goal of the course is to introduce the students to a special field of research in quantum optics.
